FAQ's

Doctec system is cloud-based, all you [Clinicians] need is a computer (PC or Mac, laptop or desktop) with a recent web browser and a high-speed Internet connection.

DocTec

DocTec is a cloud based health record system. It provides the summary of health record and it is securely stored in one place electronically.

Trusted by 100,000+ people
